name: Run Me My Money
description:
Run Me My Money is a short 2D platformer built around sharp, fluid movement and a combo-based combat system.

Movement

The primary movement mechanic in this game is Kicking. While touching a wall or over a kickable object, you can press jump and hold a direction to kick in that direction. If you do this multiple times, your momentum is conserved.

Combat

The player has access to different directional attacks both in the air and on the ground. Each attack has its own unique knock-back angle, strength, and damage which allow the player to string them together into combos.

Combos

We wanted to encourage creative combos, so enemies have too much health to be killed with any single move and will recover quickly unless they are kept in hit-stun. Enemies are also kickable objects while they're in hit-stun so you can do some really crazy stuff with enough practice and precision.
